mapper.sql: id, applyPersonName, applyPersonTel, idCard, companyName, readyName, legalPerson, regBonus, areaCode, companyAddress, manageExtent, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, modifyUserId, modifyUserName, modifyDate, status,lsNo,tab,shUserId,shUserName,shDate,basicStatus
mapper.insert: insert into serve_business (id,lsNo, applyPersonName, applyPersonTel, idCard, companyName, readyName, legalPerson, regBonus, areaCode, companyAddress, manageExtent, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, modifyUserId, modifyUserName, modifyDate, status,tab,shUserId,shUserName,shDate,basicStatus ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regBonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageExtent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tab,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{basicStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update serve_business set applyPersonName = #{applyPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyPersonTel = #{applyPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, readyName = #{readyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legalPerson = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regBonus = #{regBonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaCode = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyAddress = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manageExtent = #{manageExtent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyUserName = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tab = #{tab,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shUserId = #{shUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shUserName = #{shUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shDate = #{shDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, basicStatus= #{basicStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: t.id,t.lsNo, t.applyPersonName, t.applyPersonTel, t.idCard, t.companyName, t.readyName, t.legalPerson, t.regBonus, t.areaCode, t.companyAddress, t.manageExtent, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.modifyUserId, t.modifyUserName, t.modifyDate, t.status,t.tab,t.shUserId,t.shUserName,t.shDate,t.basicStatus
mapper.select: select s.id,s.applyPersonName,s.idCard,s.createDate,s.lsNo,s.companyName,s.readyName,s.regBonus,s.manageExtent,s.areaCode,s.companyAddress, d.name,d.mobile,d.type, a.type,a.`option`,a.content from serve_business s left join serve_business_detail d on s.id=d.businessId left join serve_business_append a on a.businessId=s.id where s.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
